text: Jaba hamile timibata vaca liyaum ra tura parvatala'i timimathi ubhyayaum. (Ra adesa diyaum) ki juna (kitaba) hamile timila'i di'eka chaum tyasala'i bes'sari samata ra (adesala'i) suna, ta tiniharule bhane ki hamile sun'yaum tara mandainaum, ra tinako nastikatako karanale tinako hrdayama bachoko maya pala'ihalyo. (He muham'mada) tiniharula'i bhanidinu ki timro imanale timila'i naramro adesa gariraheko cha yadi timi asthavana hau
